ground_truth: We are given that $\frac{9}{\text{S}}=\frac{\text{S}}{\text{T}}=3.$ \[\frac{9}{\text{S}}=3\] gives us $S=3,$ so \[\frac{\text{S}}{\text{T}}=3\] gives us $T=1$.
